description:
The Onin war created the chaos that would usher in the Sengoku period, and turmoil like that always spells trouble for the common people. Thankfully, some samurai like Hojo Soun were willing to rise up and help the helpless.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uprisings to Protect the Weak, and Stand Against the Strong! Hojo Soun!
Yowaki o Tasuke Tsuyoki o Kujiku Gekokujou, Houjou Souun!
弱きを助け強きをくじく下克上, 北条早雲!
